July 25, 2025 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer role at Microsoft. With a 
strong foundation in distributed systems, backend development, and incident response, 
I am eager to contribute to Microsoft’s mission of building resilient, planet-scale 
infrastructure that supports billions of global users.

In my current role as a Software Developer at Go Digit Life Insurance, I work closely 
with systems that demand high availability and real-time responsiveness. I have 
designed and deployed microservices using Java and Spring Boot, optimized 
PostgreSQL queries for sub-second latency, and built a Kafka-based event processing 
system that handles over 500K messages per day with 99.9% reliability. Additionally, I 
have improved incident resolution time by 60% by implementing automated runbooks,

health checks, and real-time monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. 
My academic and personal projects have reinforced my expertise in system design and 
large-scale architectures. For example, I developed a real-time fraud detection system 
using Kafka Streams and Spark, a distributed URL shortener with 1M+ monthly hits, 
and a secure file storage platform using MinIO. These initiatives not only strengthened 
my skills in C++, Python, and cloud-native technologies, but also deepened my

understanding of fault tolerance, load balancing, and observability in complex systems. 
I am particularly drawn to this role because of Microsoft’s focus on reliability 
engineering and rapid incident response within globally distributed systems. The 
opportunity to work on first-responder systems and collaborate with experts to ensure 
high availability and performance at scale excites me. I am also enthusiastic about

contributing to innovations like Copilot, LLM-powered services, and secure enterprise 
integrations with platforms such as SAP and ServiceNow. 
I bring to the table strong problem-solving skills, a growth mindset, and a deep 
commitment to service excellence. I would be honored to join Microsoft in building 
resilient systems that empower people and organizations around the world. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss

how my background and experience align with Microsoft’s vision. 
Sincerely, 
Rohit Kumar
